item.title: Install and configure mailcatcher for Rails project
item.description: Install and start mailcatcher Type in terminal next commands: $ gem install mailcatcher $ mailcatcher The output to the terminal will be like this Starting MailCatcher ==> smtp://127.0.0.1:1025 /home/artem/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.6.0@mailcatcher/gems/thin-1.5.1/lib/thin/server.rb:104: warning: constant ::Fixnum is deprecated ==> http://127.0.0.1:1080 *** MailCatcher runs as a daemon by default. Go to the web interface to quit. Add this config to you environment file, for example: config/environments/staging.rb config.action_mailer.default_url_options = { host: 'example.com' } config.action_mailer.delivery_method = :smtp config.
